bulkUpload.title: Loda Ƙungiyoyi da Yawa
bulkUpload.howToUse: Yadda Ake Amfani da Loda da Yawa
bulkUpload.instruction1: Sauke fayil ɗin misali (tsarin CSV, Excel, ko JSON)
bulkUpload.instruction2: Cika bayanan ƙungiya: suna, URL tambari, filin wasa, shekarar kafa, manajan
bulkUpload.instruction3: Ƙara ƴan wasa da: suna, matsayi, lambar riga (1-99), ƙyaftin, mai tsaron gida
bulkUpload.instruction4: Kowace ƙungiya dole ta kasance da ɗAYA ƙyaftin da ɗAYA mai tsaron gida kawai
bulkUpload.instruction5: Lambobin riga dole su kasance na musamman a cikin kowace ƙungiya
bulkUpload.instruction6: Loda fayil ɗin ko manna bayanan a ƙasa
bulkUpload.previewReady: Dubawa ({count} ƙungiyoyi a shirye don lodawa)
bulkUpload.foundedYearRange: Shekarar kafa dole ta kasance tsakanin 1800 da shekarar yanzu
bulkUpload.logoValidUrl: Tambari dole ta zama ingantaccen URL na hoto
bulkUpload.jerseyNumberRange: ɗan wasa {name}: Lambar riga dole ta kasance tsakanin 1-99
bulkUpload.jerseyNumberUsed: ɗan wasa {name}: An riga an yi amfani da lambar riga {number}
bulkUpload.oneCaptainPerTeam: Ana yarda da ƙyaftin ɗaya kawai kowace ƙungiya
bulkUpload.oneGoalkeeperPerTeam: Ana yarda da mai tsaron gida ɗaya kawai kowace ƙungiya
bulkUpload.invalidPlayersFormat: Tsarin bayanan ƴan wasa ba daidai ba ne. Dole ya zama tsarin JSON mai inganci
bulkUpload.excelLoaded: An loda fayil ɗin Excel cikin nasara
bulkUpload.excelParseFailed: An kasa rarraba fayil ɗin Excel. Da fatan duba tsarin fayil ɗin.
bulkUpload.excelReadFailed: An kasa karanta fayil ɗin Excel
bulkUpload.csvLoaded: An loda fayil ɗin CSV cikin nasara
bulkUpload.jsonLoaded: An loda fayil ɗin JSON cikin nasara
bulkUpload.invalidExcelFormat: Tsarin bayanan Excel ba daidai ba ne
bulkUpload.invalidJsonFormat: Tsarin JSON ba daidai ba ne
bulkUpload.noValidData: Ba a sami ingantaccen bayanan ƙungiya ba
bulkUpload.noTeamsToUpload: Babu ƙungiyoyi da za a loda
